long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Faster OCR improves your workflow by swiftly extracting text from images and PDFs that may contain images, all while ensuring that your data stays secure and is never exposed online.

Languages: English - Chinese [中文] - Japanese [日本語] - Korean [한국어] - Arabic [العربية] - Tamil [தமிழ்] - Devanagari [देवनागरी]

Features:
• ⚡ Performance: quickly converts images to text without delays(file not sent to internet).
• 🎯 Precision: delivers highly accurate results.
• 🔒 Offline Functionality: operates entirely offline, ensuring your data stays private.
• 🌍 Multilingual: handles multiple languages.
• 🔄 Text Rotation Detection: captures and processes rotated text.

You can edit the processed content directly in the editor.
• 📝 Copy Options: use the [RAW] icon to copy the plain text or [DOC] for editors like MS Word.
• ⏳ Processing Speed: depends on your system resources and file size.

Note: compatibility may vary across devices.
